reviewText: How can you go wrong with a collection of these wonderful romances?!The collection is beautifully done and definitely a keeper. I keep thinking of people I should give them to because they would love them, but I just can't give them up.There are times in my life when I just want to slow things down and enjoy a romantic novel that I don't have to read. Those are the times when nothing good is on television and I'm just too tired from working on my computer for hours to want to read anything.This collection has a permanent place in my home.
summary: What a Delightful Collection!  This one is a keeper.
Title: The Romance Collection: (Pride and Prejudice / Emma / Jane Eyre / Ivanhoe / Tom Jones / and more)

reviewText: There is no doubt that the BBC produces the finest dramatic interpretations of classic English literature. This particular collection enchants from beginning to end.
Title: The Romance Collection: (Pride and Prejudice / Emma / Jane Eyre / Ivanhoe / Tom Jones / and more)

reviewText: I enjoy these type of romance movies. I'm always looking to see what's new and available.  This is a good collection of chick movies.
Title: The Romance Collection: (Pride and Prejudice / Emma / Jane Eyre / Ivanhoe / Tom Jones / and more)

reviewText: Most of these are very close to the original books.  I find these my favorite movie versions of the books.
Title: The Romance Collection: (Pride and Prejudice / Emma / Jane Eyre / Ivanhoe / Tom Jones / and more)

reviewText: I love this collection and since it arrived quickly I have been able to enjoy it a few times and still have some more of the collection to view - but it arrived quickly and in perfect condition.  Very happy with this product.
Title: The Romance Collection: (Pride and Prejudice / Emma / Jane Eyre / Ivanhoe / Tom Jones / and more)

reviewText: I bought via Amazon Marketplace, but it was New, still in the original shrink wrap. The content, production values, acting, etc. are generally very good to excellent, and 30 hours of entertainment for the price is good value. However, I have one problem with this set which keeps it from getting 5 stars, the packaging. One of the discs simply falls out of the case, you have to catch it every time, and another disc is somewhat loose. I can find no remedy for the problem, so I will probably end up storing the discs in something other than the original case. if I could separate the two, I would probably give it 5 stars for content, but zero for packaging.
Title: The Romance Collection: (Pride and Prejudice / Emma / Jane Eyre / Ivanhoe / Tom Jones / and more)

reviewText: I liked most of the movies but Ivanhoe and Tom Jones (all about his sexual exploits) were just too much!!  Pride and Prejudice I enjoyed very much because of the period and seems to stick close to the book.  I like British dramas but didn't care for the above two.
Title: The Romance Collection: (Pride and Prejudice / Emma / Jane Eyre / Ivanhoe / Tom Jones / and more)

reviewText: Received in a timely fashion.  Great price for several dvd movies!!!  My daughters & I have really enjoyed the older movies.  Purchased as a birthday gift to myself and was very pleased.  Thanks for selling!!!
Title: The Romance Collection: (Pride and Prejudice / Emma / Jane Eyre / Ivanhoe / Tom Jones / and more)

reviewText: I love that you can put a face to the names you've so long read about.  Great casts, etc.
Title: The Romance Collection: (Pride and Prejudice / Emma / Jane Eyre / Ivanhoe / Tom Jones / and more)

reviewText: I bought this for Pride & Prejudice, but the bonus is that you get all of these other excellent movies, like The Scarlet Pimpernel, Emma, Jane Eyre, etc.  It's well worth the cost!
Title: The Romance Collection: (Pride and Prejudice / Emma / Jane Eyre / Ivanhoe / Tom Jones / and more)

reviewText: You get a lot of movie time for you money.  I was a bit on the fence before buying this item, because so many of the movies I'd never seen or never heard of.  But while I've technically only watched two of the movies so far, they were so lengthy!  In a good way!  I was surprised at how much entertainment pleasure this gave me.  I look forward to other rainy days or no internet days when I'm just longing for a good movie to watch....or begin to watch with the length of some.You will definitely not be dissatisfied with this purchase.
Title: The Romance Collection: (Pride and Prejudice / Emma / Jane Eyre / Ivanhoe / Tom Jones / and more)

reviewText: This collection is absolutely wonderful.  I have enjoyed every one of the productions.  My husband happened to come by while I was watching Lorna Doone and he decided to watch every one of them.  It took a while to watch them; however, it was time well invested.  The very best are Pride and Prejudice, Lorna Doone, Emma, and Tom Jones. Jane Eyre and the Scarlet Pimpernel are almost as good.  It took us a while to warm up to Ivanhoe, but we did.  You get a set of movies that will give you hours and hours of viewing pleasure for a very reasonable price.  The quality is excellent - I already owned Pride and Prejudice and Emma and the quality in this set is exactly the same as the quality of my dvds.  I definitely recommend it.
Title: The Romance Collection: (Pride and Prejudice / Emma / Jane Eyre / Ivanhoe / Tom Jones / and more)

reviewText: Hard to beat the number of flics for the price.  Really enjoyed most of them and will view them over and over for years, I am sure, but found Tom Jones too raunchy and sex-obsessed for our tastes and have retired it to our frisbee collection.
summary: Mostly great romance and value but...
Title: The Romance Collection: (Pride and Prejudice / Emma / Jane Eyre / Ivanhoe / Tom Jones / and more)

reviewText: I like this collection.  There are a coue in this series that I have not watched more than once because the inappropriate content.  Love this version of pride and prejudice!
Title: The Romance Collection: (Pride and Prejudice / Emma / Jane Eyre / Ivanhoe / Tom Jones / and more)
